title: Twist and Pulse break their silence after Britain's Got Talent: The Champions win leaked
text:

Twist and Pulse were crowned the winners of Britain's Got Talent: The Champions last night.

But their win won't come as a surprise to some, as the result was leaked months before the grand finale aired this weekend.

And now the dancers, real names Ashley Glazebrook and Glen Murphy, have broken their silence about the secret getting out, admitting it was inevitable.

Ashley told Mirror Online: "It's one of those things when you've got that many people in the crowd.

"Some people uploaded videos of it and screenshots, it's so hard. We used to just perform and leave the building and that's it and hope it didn't come out."

(Image: Tom Dymond)

It was particularly disappointing for the boys as they'd worked so hard to keep it a secret so the surprise wouldn't be ruined for the TV viewers.

Every time a social media follower commented something about the win they'd rush to delete it.

Ashley added: "We wanted to keep it so fans could experience the show the way it's meant to be done rather than spoiling it because it takes the fun out of it.

"But I don't think it took anything away from the show. It got more people talking so maybe it did create more hype."

(Image: Tom Dymond/ITV)

The boys first appeared on BGT in 2010 when they were runners up.

And they certainly felt the pressure when they were asked to return.

Glen said: "We knew we had to up our game and put our all into it so it's shown that hard work does actually pay off sometimes.

"We were gigging and working. At one point we were on a cruise ship and we were using the gym to rehearse in there after hours when everyone had gone to sleep.

"We'd just go back into the gym and use it as much as we could. We kind of tried to put in as much time as we could.

"As short as the routine was, it's kind of gruelling and it takes out of you."

Their next move is doing a pantomime later this year and they're starting their first ever UK tour in February.

Ashley said: "It's our first ever tour and it's ten years of Twist and Pulse. We want to make sure we do something big with our first ever UK tour."
description: EXCLUSIVE: The winner of Britain's Got Talent: The Champions was leaked months before the grand finale aired this weekend
